rs-table.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this resource set?
rs-table.no-resource-sets: There are no resource sets registered. Introduce a protected to this authorization server to let it register some.
rs-table.shared-nobody-tooltip: This resource is not accessible by anyone else, edit the policies and share it with someone.

policy-table.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this policy?
policy-table.no-policies: There are no policies for this resource set: This resource set is inaccessible by others.
policy-table.required-claims-info: Users that you share this resource will with need to be able to present the following claims in order to access the resource.

policy-form.clear-all-confirm: Are you sure you want to clear all claims from this policy?

policy.advanced-error-description: There was an error saving your advanced claim. Did you fill in all required fields?
